answers.answer: was it the right thing to do by telling my doctor that I was going to an endocrinologist 50 miles away for a second opinion? Will it be just as hard to get them to look furthur into it?
Hate to say it, but welcome to the Club!

Get a new doctor right away!  You can look at forums like this one that focus on your local area and get referrals from other Thyroid patients.  I feel blessed that I had a very responsive and thorough endo who took the time to explain EVERYTHING to me and left no stone left unturned.  Stay away from endos that focus heavily on Diabetes...if it is their passion then, I feel they don't spend enough time on thyroid disorders.
